title: Decent ping to ping test servers with command prompt, terrible ping in game.
body:
I am averaging 96 ping to the servers using the command prompt usually jumping between 60-100 ping with small spikes with 3% packet loss.

The network log reader tells me this though.

"Your average ping was 207 milliseconds.

The worst ping you experienced was 378ms. This means you experienced high ping during this game, which is likely where you were seeing issues. See below for a few recommendations to help out with this.

Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 9.75%.

Overall, this means you had a high amount of packets lost during the game. This can be caused by various network issues, so please see below for a few common steps that can help reduce packet loss."

The ping test was going on at the same time as the game this network log was from.

Please help.

replies.body:
Thanks for getting those logs for us! It's pretty clear that there's a connection issue between your network and our game server. Let's run through our [Connections Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to narrow down the issue.

Hit me up if you've got any other questions!
